title: Customer Registration and Login Success
description: Verify that a customer can successfully register with valid details, login, and maintain session persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Select role as Customer.
Input valid registration details (email, password, name).
Submit registration form.
Verify registration success message and redirect to login.
Navigate to login page.
Input registered email and password.
Click login button.
Verify user is logged in and session persists after page reload.

title: Restaurant Registration and Login Success
description: Verify that a restaurant user can register with valid details, login, and maintain session persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Select role as Restaurant.
Input valid restaurant registration details (restaurant name, email, password, address).
Submit registration form.
Verify registration success confirmation and redirect to login.
Navigate to login page.
Input registered restaurant email and password.
Click login button.
Verify the restaurant dashboard loads and session persists on reload.

title: Delivery Driver Registration and Login Success
description: Verify that a delivery driver can register with valid details, login, and session persists correctly.

steps.description: Open registration page.
Select role as Delivery Driver.
Input valid driver details including email and password.
Submit the registration form.
Confirm registration success and redirect to login.
Navigate to login page.
Provide registered credentials and click login.
Delivery driver dashboard loads and session persists across reloads.

title: Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Ensure that login attempts with incorrect or non-existent credentials fail and proper error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter invalid email and/or password.
Press login button.
Verify error message indicating invalid credentials is displayed.
User remains on login page without session being created.

title: Restaurant Menu CRUD Operations
description: Verify that restaurants can create, read, update, and delete menu items with immediate updates reflected on the customer interface.

steps.description: Login as a restaurant user.
Navigate to menu management dashboard.
Create a new menu item with valid name, description, price, and availability.
Verify the new menu item appears in the restaurant menu list and is visible to customers.
Update the newly created menu item's price and availability.
Changes are saved and immediately reflected in customer views.
Delete the menu item.
Menu item is removed from restaurant dashboard and customer interface.

title: Order Placement and Real-time Status Updates
description: Test the full order lifecycle from customer order placement to delivery completion with real-time status updates for all user roles.

steps.description: Login as a customer.
Select restaurant and add multiple menu items to cart.
Place the order.
Order appears in customer's order history with status 'Pending'.
Login as restaurant user and view incoming order.
Accept the order and update status to 'Accepted'.
Customer receives real-time notification of order acceptance.
Restaurant updates order status to 'Prepared' and then 'Ready for Pickup'.
Customer's order status updates in real-time and notification center records status changes.
Delivery driver logs in, marks availability, sees available deliveries, and accepts the order.
Restaurant and customer receive notifications about driver assignment.
Delivery driver updates status to 'En Route' and then 'Delivered'.
Customer and restaurant receive final delivery notifications and order status updates.

title: Notification System Real-Time Update Validation
description: Verify that toast alerts, notification center history, and badge counters are updated instantly for order-related events for all user roles.

steps.description: Trigger order creation, acceptance, preparation, and delivery events through appropriate users.
Check that each type of event triggers corresponding toast notification.
Confirm notification center shows persistent and correct history of events.
Verify badge counters on notification icon increment and decrement correctly.

title: Internationalization and RTL Layout Support
description: Verify that user can switch UI language among Portuguese, English, and Hebrew and UI adapts correctly including right-to-left layout for Hebrew.

steps.description: Login as any user type.
Switch UI language to Portuguese.
Verify all UI text is displayed in Portuguese.
Switch UI language to English.
Verify all UI text is displayed in English.
Switch UI language to Hebrew.
Verify all UI text is displayed in Hebrew and layout switches to right-to-left.

title: Connectivity Offline and Online Status Handling
description: Test detection of online and offline modes, correct UI feedback, and functionality under intermittent connectivity conditions.

steps.description: Simulate going offline in the browser or device.
Verify offline status indicator appears and UI reflects offline mode.
Attempt actions such as browsing restaurants, placing orders while offline.
Verify graceful fail or offline mode messaging without data loss or crashes.
Simulate return to online status.
Confirm UI updates to online status and any queued actions sync with backend.

title: Role-based Logout and Session Expiry
description: Verify that each user role can logout correctly and session expiry enforces re-login with proper state reset.

steps.description: Login as customer, restaurant, or delivery driver.
Click logout button.
Verify user session is cleared and app redirects to login page.
Simulate session expiration by waiting or forcing token expiry.
Perform any authenticated action after expiration.
Verify that the user is forced to login again and session reset.

title: User Dashboard Responsiveness and Layout
description: Verify that the user dashboards (customer, restaurant, delivery) render correctly and remain usable on multiple screen sizes without layout issues.

steps.description: Login as each user type individually.
Resize browser window from desktop to typical mobile widths.
Verify UI elements adapt responsively with no overlapping, cutoffs, or broken layouts.
Check usability of navigation, buttons, and input fields on small and large screens.

title: Order Rejection Handling by Restaurant
description: Verify that restaurants can reject orders with a reason and customers receive appropriate real-time notification and status update.

steps.description: Customer places an order.
Restaurant user views the new pending order.
Restaurant rejects the order providing a rejection reason.
Customer receives notification of rejection with reason.
Order status updates to 'Rejected' and is visible to all relevant users.

title: Delivery Driver Feedback and Delivery Completion
description: Verify that delivery driver can mark an order as delivered and leave feedback, which reflects to restaurant and customer.

steps.description: Delivery driver accepts an available order.
Update order status to 'En Route'.
Mark order as delivered and submit delivery feedback.
Delivery status updates to 'Delivered' for customer and restaurant.
Feedback submitted by the delivery driver is recorded and accessible.

title: Real-time Synchronization Across User Views
description: Ensure that order status, menu updates, and notifications are synchronized in real-time across customers, restaurants, and delivery drivers without requiring reload.

steps.description: Place order as customer.
Monitor restaurant order list.
Order appears immediately in restaurant dashboard without refreshing.
Restaurant updates menu item.
Customer interface instantly reflects the menu change.
Delivery driver changes delivery status.
Customer and restaurant views update order status in real time.

title: Animation System Loading and Display
description: Verify Lottie animations load correctly on key screens and enhance user experience without performance issues.

steps.description: Navigate to key screens such as welcome page, restaurant wizard, and delivery tracking.
Lottie animations load and play smoothly without glitches.
Animations do not block or delay main UI interactions.

title: Unauthorized Access Restriction
description: Verify that users cannot access protected routes or operations without proper authentication or role authorization.

steps.description: Attempt to access restaurant dashboard without logging in.
User is redirected to login page.
Login as a customer and try to access delivery driver interface.
Access is denied or redirected appropriately.
Perform API calls with invalid or missing JWT tokens.
APIs respond with authorization errors.

title: Notification Persistence Across Sessions
description: Verify that notifications received are stored persistently and accessible in notification center after logout and relogin.

steps.description: Generate notifications by creating and updating orders.
Verify notifications appear in notification center.
Logout and login again.
Notifications from previous session remain accessible and badge counts are correct.

title: Cart Management Edge Cases
description: Verify proper handling of edge cases in customer cart such as adding unavailable menu items, quantity limits, and empty cart order attempts.

steps.description: Attempt to add a menu item marked as unavailable to the cart.
User receives an informative error message and item is not added.
Add maximum allowable quantity of an item to the cart and attempt to exceed.
Cart limits are enforced and user is notified.
Attempt to place an order with an empty cart.
Order placement is blocked and user is prompted to add items.

title: Performance and Responsiveness Under Load
description: Assess system responsiveness when multiple orders are placed and status updates occur concurrently.

steps.description: Simulate multiple customers placing orders simultaneously.
Simultaneously update order statuses from multiple restaurants and delivery drivers.
Real-time updates are delivered without noticeable delay or UI freezing.
Notifications and UI remain responsive and accurate.

title: Cross-Browser Compatibility
description: Verify that the platform functions correctly on major browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) across desktop and mobile.

steps.description: Open the application on supported desktop browsers and perform core user flows.
UI renders correctly and all functions (login, ordering, notifications) work as expected.
Open the application on supported mobile browsers.
Layout, responsive design, and interactions work properly without critical issues.
